hero.title: Fair & Transparent Pricing
hero.description: You set your prices. We provide the platform. Start earning or get help today with our simple, transparent pricing model.

howItWorks.title: How Pricing Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple, transparent, and fair for everyone

forCustomers.title: For Customers
forCustomers.description: You have full control over what you pay

setYourBudget.title: Set Your Budget
setYourBudget.description: When posting a job, you choose the price you're willing to pay. Taskers apply with their proposals.

bookDirectly.title: Book Services Directly
bookDirectly.description: Browse tasker services with their set prices. Book instantly at the price shown.

noFees.title: No Platform Fees
noFees.description: Customers pay zero fees. You only pay the agreed price for completed work.

forTaskers.title: For Taskers
forTaskers.description: Set your own prices and earn what you deserve

setYourPrices.title: Set Your Own Prices
setYourPrices.description: You decide how much to charge for your services. Price competitively based on your skills and experience.

applyToJobs.title: Apply to Customer Jobs
applyToJobs.description: See customer budgets and submit your proposals. Win jobs that match your rates.

platformFee.title: 10% Platform Fee
platformFee.description: We charge a 10% fee on your earnings. This covers payment processing, platform maintenance, and customer support.

walletSystem.title: Tasker Wallet System
walletSystem.subtitle: Start working immediately with our wallet-based system
walletSystem.description: Taskers need credits in their wallet before accepting jobs or bookings. This ensures smooth transactions and protects both parties.

freeCredits.title: 50 MAD Free for Early Taskers
freeCredits.description: The first 200 registered taskers receive 50 MAD free in their wallet! Start exploring the platform and complete your first jobs without any upfront payment.

step1.title: Request Payment Code
step1.description: Go to your wallet page and request a unique payment code for the amount you want to add.

step2.title: Pay at Any Payment Point
step2.description: Use the code to pay at any payment point (like InDrive). Multiple payment methods available across Morocco.

step3.title: Credits Added Instantly
step3.description: Once payment is confirmed, credits are added to your wallet immediately. Start accepting jobs right away!

secure.title: Secure Transactions
secure.description: Wallet payments are processed securely through bank transfers and payment points

instant.title: Instant Access
instant.description: Credits are available immediately after payment confirmation

flexible.title: Flexible Payments
flexible.description: Add credits whenever you need, in any amount you choose

transparent.title: Full Transparency
transparent.description: Track all your transactions and wallet balance in real-time

pricingModel.title: Our Pricing Model
pricingModel.subtitle: Fair for everyone, transparent for all

postJob.title: Post a Job
postJob.description: Set your budget when posting. Taskers see your budget and apply with proposals.
postJob.example: Example: Post a cleaning job with a 200 MAD budget

bookService.title: Book a Service
bookService.description: Browse services with fixed prices set by taskers. Book at the listed price.
bookService.example: Example: Book a 150 MAD/hour cleaning service

noFees.title: Zero Fees
noFees.description: No booking fees, no hidden charges. Pay only for completed work.

servicePrices.title: Set Service Prices
servicePrices.description: When creating a service listing, set your hourly or fixed rate. Customers see and book at your price.
servicePrices.example: Example: Set your cleaning service at 150 MAD/hour

jobProposals.title: Submit Job Proposals
jobProposals.description: See customer budgets and submit your proposal. Win jobs that match your rates.
jobProposals.example: Example: Propose 180 MAD for a 200 MAD budget job

platformFee.title: 10% Platform Fee
platformFee.description: We charge 10% on your earnings. This is deducted automatically when you receive payment.
platformFee.example: Example: Earn 200 MAD, receive 180 MAD (10% = 20 MAD fee)

examples.title: Real Examples
examples.subtitle: See how pricing works in practice

example1.title: Customer Posts a Job
example1.scenario: Customer posts: 'Need house cleaning, budget: 200 MAD'
example1.taskers: Taskers apply with proposals: 180 MAD, 200 MAD, 220 MAD
example1.customer: Customer chooses the best proposal and pays 200 MAD
example1.tasker: Tasker receives 180 MAD (200 MAD - 10% = 20 MAD platform fee)

example2.title: Customer Books a Service
example2.scenario: Customer books: 'Cleaning service at 150 MAD/hour for 3 hours'
example2.tasker: Tasker receives 405 MAD (450 MAD - 10% = 45 MAD platform fee)
